蘹字的基本解释

蘹
huái
〔蘹香〕即“茴香”，一种草本植物，茎叶嫩时可食，子实入药。

蘹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huái］
［《集韻》乎乖切，平皆，匣。］
见“蘹香”。

蘹字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘹； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1071第23
【集韻】乎乖切，音懷。草名。【本草】蘹香。【註】北人呼爲茴香，聲相近也。詳茴字註。

蘹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
蘹字的起名意思

暂无。

Shit
Basic explanation of words
Shit
huái
〔蘹香〕It means "fennel", a kind of herb, edible when the stems and leaves are tender, and the seeds are used as medicine.
Shit
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huái］
["Jiyun" is almost obediently cut, flat and boxy. ]
See "Fengxiang".
Shit
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蘹; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1071 Page 23
【Jiyun】Almost obediently, with a heart of voice. Cursive name. 【Materia Medica】Fragrant. [Note] The northern people call it fennel, and the sound is similar. Detailed fennel note.
